Title: Important Security Announcement
Description: We regret to inform you that Redhill Games Oy has had its data compromised. We were attacked with an email scam and in the process the perpetrators may have gained access to our files. We have no evidence of files being copied or accessed but cannot rule this out. Due to our association we hold documents that may contain your confidential information ‚Äì like your name, email, IP address or age group.

Title: Creating a co_await awaitable signal that can be awaited multiple times, part 1 | The Old New Thing

Title: The Last Message Sent on AIM
Description: In the early 2000s social media sites like Facebook and Twitter weren‚Äôt commonplace yet. Even text messages, at ten cents each, were something to be rationed. For many teenagers the primary means of communication outside school was AOL Instant Messenger (AIM). So when it was announced in October that they were shutting down AIM after 20 years, I felt a wave of nostalgia for the messaging app of my youth.
